# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Zookeeper [italic]This job is primarily for roleplay and not considered as important as other roles.[/italic]
The Zookeeper is responsible for looking after the animals on the station. They can achieve this by feeding and watering the animals, and responding to any situations where the animals are loose. The Zookeeper is only available on certain stations.
## Do - Look after the animals. - Non-lethally restrain animals that are loose.
## Don't - Capture the Clown, treat them like the animal they are and put them on display. Contrary to popular belief, the Clown has rights.
